strings.msg.error.recycle.kitty: High level kitty can't be recycled
strings.msg.thanks.rewards.for.ads: Meow, Thanks for supporting, Rewards are comming~~
strings.msg.ads.rewards.failed: MeoW, Ads needs to be finished for extra rewards~~
strings.ui.checkin.msg: Meow~Check in everyday, keep doctor away~
strings.ui.task.tip: Finish all challenges for Extra BONUS
strings.ui.task.total.rewards.name: BONUS
strings.ui.collection.msg: Meow, do you recognize these kitties?
strings.ui.lottery.tip: (Come back Daily and Get Free Coupons)
strings.ui.treasure.hunt.title: Treasure Hunting
strings.ui.hide.seek.title: Hide and Seek
strings.ui.hide.seek.tip: (How To: Tap the kitty when it comes out)
strings.guide.step.1.msg:
Meow~
You look new to me
Let me give you some hints
strings.guide.step.2.msg:
First, Click on the BOWL
Feed a kitty
strings.guide.step.3.msg:
Wow, you feed a Babe Kitty~

Want another ?
strings.guide.step.4.msg: Now, Click on the BOWL again
strings.guide.step.5.msg:
Look
You have TWO Babe Kitty now
Try drag them together
strings.guide.step.5.input.tip: Drag kitties of same level together
strings.guide.step.7.msg:
Simple, right? Two steps:

First, Click the BOWL and Feed Kitty
strings.guide.step.8.msg: Second, Drag Kitties of same level To Upgrade
strings.guide.step.9.msg:
Now, you're ready~

Go feed more kitties and have fun~
strings.bk.guide.step.9.msg:
Now, you have TWO Black Kitties
Try drag them together
strings.bk.guide.step.12.msg:
HINT
Drag kitties of same level to UPGRADE
strings.bk.guide.step.13.msg: Great! You are master of kitty feeding now
strings.bk.guide.step.14.msg: BTW, Always come back to collect your OFFLINE GIFT
ui.games.petting: Do you know how to make a kitty happy?
ui.games.match: Who said I can't sneak in?

Following foot steps, find the exit
event.hide.seek.rewards.msg: Meow, you are KING of Hide and Seek~
Take the rewards, you earned it
share.titles: 撸猫一时爽，一直撸一直爽~
猫是用来爱的，所以要可爱~
做猫呢，最重要的是开心~
要不要撸会猫，开心一下？
我不是在撸猫，就在去撸猫的路上~
同学，你知道怎么正确撸猫吗？
做人呢，最重要的是开心，还有撸猫~
谈钱伤感情，还是撸猫吧

k2.name: Dark Eyes
k2.quotes:
I was given dark eyes by the night
Yet I use them to play seek and hide~

k3.name: Snow White
k3.quotes: A white complexion is powerful enough to hide seven faults.

k4.name: Gray Fur
k4.quotes:
Life isn't black and white.
It's a million gray areas, don't you find?

k5.name: Yellow Light
k5.quotes: I am the warm yellow light, I pour over everyone I love.

k6.name: Ginger
k6.quotes:
Ten ginger cats nine fats
But I am the tenth。

k7.name: Big Ginger
k7.quotes:
I am not fat
I am STRONG.

k8.name: Blue British Shorthair
k8.quotes:
Hello, it's me.
I was wondering if anybody really read this?

k9.name: White British Shorthair
k9.quotes: I think you should give up if it leads nowhere.

k10.name: Smiley British Shorthair
k10.quotes: Never mind, I'll find someone like you

k11.name: Somali Cat
k11.quotes:
I will find One Piece
of canned fish!

k13.name: Blue Exotic Shorthair
k13.quotes: I hate Mondays, and Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday too.

k14.name: Dragon-Li
k14.quotes: I was called Li Hua in Chinese

k15.name: Persian Longhair
k15.quotes: Who don't want long hairs or a longhair cat?

k17.name: Calico British Shorthair
quotes: It was just like a movie
It was just like a song

k18.name: Silver Shaded
k18.quotes: I don't know what this cat is.

k19.name: Smiley Persian cat
k19.quotes: The first Persian cat was presented at the first organized cat show, in 1871.

k20.name: Birman
k20.quotes: I wear white socks on each paw

k22.name: Norwegian Forest Cat
k22.quotes: I can survive Norway's cold weather

k23.name: Oriental Shorthair
k23.quotes: I am a member of the Siamese family

k25.name: Tiffany White
k25.quotes:
Meow~
Simply put some words here to fill the gap.

k26.name: Himalayan
k26.quotes: It was for the color that I was named Himalayan

k27.name: Golder Shaded
k27.quotes: Even the iPhone borrows my color

k28.name: Tabby Exotic Shorthair
k28.quotes: It's not that I dislike you, I just don't like you near me.

k29.name: Chinchilla Cat
k29.quotes: I am a type of Persian cat

k1003.name: Pharaoh Cat
k1003.quotes: I am son of the sun
